title: Arcane Battery
content:
Arcane Battery Effect Alleviate the arcane burden ofspellcasting with the power of this staff. The next spell you cast doesn't cost a spell slot. You need to toggle this feature on in order to activate this effect. Equipment Markoheshkir

Alleviate the arcane burden ofspellcasting with the power of this staff. The next spell you cast doesn't cost a spell slot.

You need to toggle this feature on in order to activate this effect.

Arcane Battery is an Equipment Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Arcane
